record.id: field.name="subscriber" and file.name="Subscription" and term=NULL and format.name=NULL and syslanguage="en"
record.field.name: subscriber
record.file.name: Subscription

brief.brief: The name of the individual or group that is subscribing to the Business Service.

detail.detail: If the subscription is an individual-type subscription, the value of this field is the full name of the person subscribing to the Business Service, as specified in the contacts record for that person. If the subscription is a group-type subscription (e.g. a department subscription), then the value of this field is the name of the group subscribing to the Business Service.
For an individual subscription, Subscriber="EMPLOYEE, JOE"
For a group subscription, Subscriber="ACME HQ"
